title: My heart
text:
I looked in the mirror
saw the terror in my face.
Was I to lose you
remembering long gone days.
You seemed indifferent
lived your life just the same.
Was I a simple victim
of a twisted little game?
And my heart don't feel so good.
So I took sixteen steps
to get away from it all.
Them steps were all it took
To initiate my fall.
Now I'm on the ground
silence sitting next to me.
A drop seeps from my eye
that will never have to see.
And my heart don't feel a thing.
vamanos

replies.text: Vá, þeta er flott. Ég vildi að ég gæti rímað svona. Mín ljóð verða bara tildursleg ef ég reyni það, en þú nærð að halda tilfinningunni allan tímann. Bravó!

Drullusvalt. Vel skrifaður andskoti!
Flott mál. Takk og Bless.
Deeq.
